Service Details: Offers a values-based approach to listening, understanding and responding to the mental health of children, youth and families with philosophy, practice and endorsement all rolled into one, the program is intended to help families and those connecting with them in communities and across systems, to identify and act upon what is meaningful for families, and what works to improve child and youth mental health
